original_text: And for those that are to be redeemed of the two hundred and threescore and thirteen of the firstborn of the children of Israel, which are more than the Levites;
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 처음 태어난 자가 레위인보다 이백칠십삼 명이 더 많은즉 속전으로

sentences.original_text: And for those that are to be redeemed
of the two hundred and threescore and thirteen
of the firstborn of the children of Israel
which are more than the Levites
